content.rendered:
[vc_row type=”container”][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_column_text]

The Accu-Surg® Dual Trumpet Valve Handle is compatible with all suction/irrigation tubing sets, as well as 5mm and 10mm trocar sleeves. The patented trumpet valve is guaranteed not to leak or stick. A quality reusable, cost effective and “green” alternative to disposable suction / irrigation cannulas.

  • Environmentally friendly & re-usable to reduce expense
  • Guaranteed not to leak or stick
  • Compatible with all suction/irrigation tubing sets
  • Sterilizable
  • Stainless Steel construction

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_gallery type=”flexslider_slide” interval=”3″ images=”72630″ img_size=”400×267″ css=”.vc_custom_1574468874014{padding-top: 0px !important;}”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row type=”container”][vc_column][vc_separator color=”#e5e5e5″ type=”normal” thickness=”1″ up=”” down=””][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row type=”container”][vc_column][vc_column_text]

Dual Trumpet Valve Handle

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]

Go “green” and reduce expense by switching to high-quality, reusable suction/irrigation cannulas. Our Accu-Surg® line is fully sterilizable, made of stainless steel, and guaranteed not to leak or stick. It is compatible with all suction/irrigation tubing sets and 5mm / 10mm trocar sleeves.

Part # 9450L

U.S. Patent No. 5,364,070

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row type=”container”][vc_column][vc_tta_tabs color=”white” active_section=”1″][vc_tta_section title=”Compatibility” tab_id=”1569386751404-824b66ba-0d54c3cc-e6ba”][vc_column_text]

Compatible with all Suction/Irrigation tubing sets. Uses a Luer Lock fitting.
Compatible with Tuohy Borst valves to hold laser fibers.
Compatible with 5mm / 10mm trocar sleeves.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title=”Regulatory” tab_id=”1569386751419-a33a2db6-6e3dc3cc-e6ba”][vc_column_text]

The Dual Trumpet Valve is a class 2 device, has 510(k) clearance and is approved to bear the CE mark.

TTI Medical is registered with the FDA and ISO 13485:2016 certified.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title=”Warranty” tab_id=”1569387831165-1b59dea1-014ac3cc-e6ba”][vc_column_text]

The Dual Trumpet Valve has a 5 year manufacturer’s warranty and support for the usable lifetime of the product.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][/vc_tta_tabs][/vc_column][/vc_row]
